thread.title: Old Town Chambers and The Real Mary King’s Close serve up a delight
thread.title_full: Old Town Chambers and The Real Mary King’s Close serve up a delight

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Old Town Chambers and The Real Mary King’s Close serve up a delight
text:
Old Town Chambers and The Real Mary King’s Close serve up a delight Old Town Chambers and The Real Mary King’s Close serve up a delight Details Category: Scotland   15:00 Edinburgh’s Old Town Chambers, five-star serviced apartments operated by Lateral City, has teamed up with The Real Mary King’s Close to offer guests the most important meal of the day – breakfast. Served from 7.30am until 10am at The Real Mary King Close recently opened café, The Royal Exchange Coffee House, guests can opt for a full Scottish or continental breakfast, or a filled breakfast roll. 
For visitors who prefer to have breakfast in their apartment, The Real Mary King’s Close is providing a breakfast pack which can be pre booked and delivered to their apartment or a breakfast delivery service of filled morning rolls delivered to the reception area of Old Town Chambers. Julie Grieve, CEO of Lateral City, said: “Our guests like having the freedom a serviced apartment brings, but sometimes they may prefer not to make breakfast. By teaming up with The Real Mary King’s Close, breakfast is literally on their doorstep and with a variety of options they’re set up for their day exploring the capital.” Rod Nisbet, Food and Beverage Manager at The Real Mary King’s Close, said: “We are really excited about this exclusive breakfast offering with Old Town Chambers. Our produce is locally sourced meaning guests can experience the taste of Scotland the moment they wake up. Guests will be able to enjoy their specially prepared breakfast before heading out to explore what Edinburgh has to offer.” Related articles
